original_text: But the people of Israel were fruitful and increased greatly; they multiplied and grew exceedingly strong, so that the land was filled with them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손은 생육하고 불어나 번성하고 매우 강하여 온 땅에 가득하게 되었더라

sentences.original_text: But the people of Israel were fruitful
so that the land was filled with them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그 땅이 그들로 가득 찼습니다
